executable.title: Model Maker
executable.description:
Create 3D surface models from segmented data. Models are imported into Slicer under a model hierarchy node (you **must** at this point make a new model hierarchy node in order for this module to run correctly), and their colors are set by the color table associated with the input volume. 
 **Create Multiple:** 
 If you specify a list of Labels, it will over ride any start/end label settings. 
 If you click ~~Generate All~~ it will over ride the list of lables and any start/end label settings. 
 **Model Maker Settings:**
 You can set the number of smoothing iterations, target reduction in number of polygons (decimal percentage). Use 0 and 1 if you wish no smoothing nor decimation.
 You can set the flags to split normals or generate point normals in this pane as well.
 You can save a copy of the models after intermediate steps (marching cubes, smoothing, and decimation if not joint smoothing, otherwise just after decimation); these models are not saved in the mrml file, turn off deleting temporary files first in the tcl window:
 ~~[$::slicer3::CommandLineModuleGUI_Model_Maker GetLogic] DeleteTemporaryFilesOff~~
 **Anatomical Information:**
 Here you can specify an external file linking label values with anatomical names.

table.name: ColorTable
table.description: Color table to make labels to colors and objects

geometry.name: ModelSceneFile
geometry.label: Models
geometry.description: Generated models, under a model hierarchy node.

parameters.label: Create Multiple
parameters.description: Create more than one model at the same time, used for continuous ranges of labels.

string.name: Name
string.label: Model Name
string.description: Name to use for this model. If making multiple models, use this as a prefix to the label and color name

boolean.name: GenerateAll
boolean.label: Generate All Models
boolean.description: Generate models for all labels in the input volume. Ignores Labels, Start Label, End Label settings. Skips label 0.

integer-vector.name: Labels
integer-vector.description: A comma separated list of label values from which to make models. Over-rides the Start/End Labels.
integer-vector.label: Labels

integer.name: StartLabel
integer.label: Start Label
integer.description: Voxel value from which to start making models. Used instead of the label list to specify a range (make sure the label list is empty or it will over ride this).

integer.name: EndLabel
integer.label: End Label
integer.description: Voxel value up to which to continue making models. Skip any values with zero voxels.

boolean.name: JointSmoothing
boolean.label: Joint Smoothing
boolean.description: Perform joint smoothing between models, so that they will fit together.

string-enumeration.name: FilterType
string-enumeration.label: Filter Type
string-enumeration.description: Controls the type of smoothing done on the model.

float.name: Decimate
float.label: Decimate
float.description: Target reduction during decimation, as a decimal percentage reduction in the number of polygons.

boolean.name: SplitNormals
boolean.label: Split Normals
boolean.description: Splitting normals is useful for visualizing sharp features. However it creates holes in surfaces which affects measurements

boolean.name: SaveIntermediateModels
boolean.label: Save Intermediate Models
boolean.description: Save a copy of the model after intermediate steps.

parameters.label: Anatomical Information
parameters.description: Use external information to name models, instead of the colors associated with the label map.

file.name: AnatomyLabelFile
file.label: Anatomy Label File
file.description: A file containing a comma separted list of anatomy names and label numbers.

boolean.name: SkipUnNamed
boolean.label: Skip Un-Named Labels
boolean.description: If true and an Anatomy Label File is specified, only models which have an entry in the Anatomy Label File will be generated. If false, generate all models that exist within the label range.
